name: Warlock The Bounty Hunter
description:
Warlock the bounty hunter is a roguelike game where you play as a warlock taking on as many bounties as you can before your eventual death.
There are 6 bounties and 4 areas, each with different pros and cons. More bounties you complete, stronger you get, more skills you unlock to help you with increased difficulty. It is an endless run where enemies outpace you and you start again. How far can you go?
